name: Survival During An Earthquake
description:
Survival Science Comics - Fun way for Kids to Learn!

Can't a family catch a break?
What if catching a break is the problem?
There is something Momo, Mimi and Momo's dad find out the hard way when their vacation to Japan is interrupted by an earthquake! The sound of the ground being cracked open is only rivaled by the tidal waves coming in to sweep them away! 

Come and be shaken, rattled and rolled along with them as they use science and knowledge to assist their SURVIVAL DURING AN EARTHQUAKE!

Pages: 208
Print: Color
Language: English

name: Survival In The Antarctic
description:
Survival Science Comics - Fun way for Kids to Learn!

It may be chilly, but things aren't looking hot in the Antarctic! While on the lookout for Emperor penguins, Momo and friends face a king-sized problem when they get lost in a blizzard! With food, water and patience running out in the middle of the frozen emptiness, they have to rely on the resources that apply everywhere: knowledge and science! 

Crashing icebergs, snowstorms and Momo's body odor present no problems, when you know how to ensure your SURVIVAL IN THE ANTARCTIC!

Pages: 208
Print: Color
Language: English

name: Treasure Hunting in India
description:
Fun Graphic Novels for kids - Filled with fun history facts!

The mysterious disappearance of Professor Gu-Bon's old colleague leads both him and his nephew Pang-Yi to India, where they find themselves facing off against their old nemesis, Professor Bong! 

A jeweled dagger forms the basis of this adventure, but between mad mothers, terrible disguises, unprofessional photography and blatant product placement, Pang-Yi and his uncle certainly have their work cut out for them! 

Let's see how our masala mavericks do TREASURE HUNTING IN INDIA!

Details: 192 pages
Print: Color
Language: English

name: Survival In A Cave
description:
Survival Science Comics - Fun way for Kids to Learn!

A cave-in accident left Momo and his friends stuck inside an unexplored cave. With no fire, no food and practically no light, their only chances of surviving the deep, dark caverns is to maintain a sense of determination and a good use of scientific knowledge. 

Join the best spelunkers in their race for survival under the darkest depths of the Earth!

Pages: 208
Print: Color
Language: English

name: Treasure Hunting in Egypt
description:
Fun Graphic Novels for kids - Filled with fun history facts!

Egypt, home of one of mankind's earliest civilizations, is about to be threatened by a denizen of one of mankind's newest ones! 

It's up to Professor Gu-Bon and his friends to put a stop to the evil and greedy Professor Bong's plans- especially now that Professor Bong has placed himself into far worse company than mere art thieves! Will our heroes foil Bong's Pyramid schemes? Or will they put some sand into the art thief's britches? 

Walk like an Egyptian down the roads this book's knowledge will open, as you join our heroes TREASURE HUNTING IN EGYPT!

Details: 192 pages
Print: Color
Language: English
